bibl.title: From Orpheus to Teiresias: Solar Issues in the Derveni Papyrus.
bibl.note: 1. Competing Readings in Col. 8. - 2. Ouranos' Phallus. - 3. The Glorious Daimon. - 4. Kronos' Birth. - 5. Fire. Refers to the role of the solar fire (according to Empedocles), as illustrated in the Strasbourg papyrus [P. Stras. Inv. 1665-1666 (= M.-P.3 356.11; LDAB 824)], ensemble d, 11-16 = vv. 341-344 Janko. - 6. In the Middle. - 7. In the Cities. - 8. Teiresias and Orpheus. - 9. Next Generation Diviners.
bibl.seg: Franco Ferrari, From Orpheus to Teiresias: Solar Issues in the Derveni Papyrus.

1. Competing Readings in Col. 8. - 2. Ouranos' Phallus. - 3. The Glorious Daimon. - 4. Kronos' Birth. - 5. Fire. Refers to the role of the solar fire (according to Empedocles), as illustrated in the Strasbourg papyrus [P. Stras. Inv. 1665-1666 (= M.-P.3 356.11; LDAB 824)], ensemble d, 11-16 = vv. 341-344 Janko. - 6. In the Middle. - 7. In the Cities. - 8. Teiresias and Orpheus. - 9. Next Generation Diviners.
